titleStmt.title: The benefice a comedy / by R.W. D.D., author of Iter Boreale, written in his younger days, now made publick for promoting innocent mirth.
titleStmt.author: Wild, Robert, 1609-1679.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, to be sold by R. Janeway ...,

notesStmt.note: "To the reader" gives the author's name: Dr. R. Wild.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
